attributes.action: donate 1% of taxes to 3rd World countries, such as Sudan, in a bid to Make Poverty History.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although 1% my not seem like much it is a start to Making Poverty History and make the world just a little fairer for people who do not have the luxury of good food, water and shelter. It will also leave the Goverment 16.5% tax to fund home issuses eg the NHS.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
